climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Machine Washable] Bothered by spending too much time cleaning a room? Unlike other plush rugs, Ophanie rug comes with the added feature of being machine washable. Now you can easily deep clean it in using your washing machine. Whether you’re a student, busy parent, or live with pets, we believe there's more to life than spending hours cleaning carpet. Additionally, the washable material will also prolong the lifespan of rugs to enjoy for years to come.

[High-Quality Faux Fur] Experience ultimate softness and comfort with our high-density faux fur. The Ophanie machine washable area rug features a 1.53-inch long pile surface, while also increasing the sponge thickness by 30% compared to our competitors' rugs, without any fiber shedding issues! This incredibly soft velvet carpet is made from environmentally friendly, non-toxic, and hypoallergenic polyester material, making it perfect for people with sensitive or allergic skin.

[Modern Design] Are you looking for decor to brighten up your space? Ophanie area rug is designed to provide you with a luxurious, comfortable living environment. With its solid color design, our rugs are suitable for various styles and rooms, including modern minimalistic, farmhouse, European, and more. The 4x6ft carpet is suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, dorms, play rooms, study rooms, home offices and children's rooms, boy or girl.

[Durable Non-Slip Bottom] Our carpets feature a durable non-slip bottom with high-density and small, sturdy anti-slip dots. The thickened felt bottom enhances friction, preventing the carpet from sliding on the floor and ensuring a safe and stable placement. It works well on different materials such as vinyl, hardwood, and tile floors. Please note that the non-slip effect may be reduced if there is water under the carpet, so please keep the bottom of the carpet dry.

[Usage Tips] To reduce unnecessary resource waste, Ophanie prodcuts are packaged using vacuum compression. We sincerely appreciate your patience in allowing the product to regain its original shape with in 48-72 hours for the best prodcut experience. When machine washing, we suggest washing it separately in cold water with a gentle detergent, and then air drying. Additionally, we provide comprehensive after-sales service, so please feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ophanie Ultra-Luxurious Soft Fluffy Area Rug, Perfect Home Decor Shag rugs belong in your home. Whether you're decorating your living room or bedroom, a shag area rug can provide an extra dose of cozy. That first step out of the bed in the morning can be a hard one to make when a cold wooden floor awaits you. Ease into the day with a cozy bedroom area rug that gives you a soft spot to land when you jump out of bed.

UPGRADED HIGH-DENSITY PILE Different from normal rugs, this Ophanie rug Surface 1.57" high, High-density velvet pile is not only given a soft feeling but also keeps your feet from the cold floor, helping reduce noise from walking. MACHINE WASH For general cleaning, Vacuum the area rug with a low-power vacuum. For a deeper clean, machine wash on cold with mild detergent and Line Dry. We recommend washing your rug separately. SAFE MATERIALS We know the family and children are very important to you and that is why our rugs are made of 100% polyester materials. All our rugs are kid and pet-friendly!

NO-SHEDDING Benefit from individual spindle drives technology in winding along with Ring Spun Yarn, enhance the twist to hold all the fibers together to make the yarn sturdier and less prone to shedding, and make it a nice decorative rug for medium traffic area. NO SLIDING OR BUNCHING Thickened felt bottom with Thousands of tiny, durable PVC dots will help to prevent the carpet from sliding around on your floors. Before placing the rug on the floor, please ensure the floor underneath the rug is clean and dry. UPGRADED DOUBLE OVERLOCK Different from the ordinary hemming, This Ophanie Area rug comes with the Upgraded Double Overlock, which makes it more durable and beautiful.
Size Guide Living Room Bedroom Nursery Apartment

Machine Washable Rug 4 x 6 ft Machine Washable Rug 2 x 3 ft Machine Washable Rug 4 x 6 ft Machine Washable Rug 4 x 6 ft Machine Washable Rug 3 x 5 ft Machine Washable Rug 2 x 3 ft Machine Wash ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-skid ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No-Shedding ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Size 4 x 6 ft 2 x 3 ft 4 x 6 ft 4 x 6 ft 3 x 5 ft 2 x 3 ft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice looking shaggy rug with grip material on back. Very soft and slick-like furry material. Not as fluffy thick as I would have liked. The fur-like shag fibers are a bit short. But good for the price. Pretty gray color, good size, works well on smooth or carpeted floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we were looking for!
reviews.reviewText: Was really just looking for a cheap and washable rug for puppy purposes. My ex's dog, who I lived with for most of her doggie life, has become best friends with my new dog and stays with us frequently. They love to play together for hours a day, and this is a great space for them to play comfortably on the floor (as opposed to just on the bed, and kind of on top of me lol).It's also great as a space for me to sit on the floor to play with and spend time with my pup. I haven't tried washing it yet, but the design and density of it make me think it should wash well and fit comfortably in my small washer (I got the 4' x 6'). It's not terribly cushy, but it does have a little bit of cushion and the fibers are soft - definitely much better of a play space for a person to sit on than a wood floor.Great, yet simple, rug for such a cheap price, and exactly what we needed for puppy purposes! (Not something I would recommend for elegance, but great for comfort and play!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft and pretty!
reviews.reviewText: I love this rug. It’s so soft. Great to have little kids on it or pets sleeping. The downside, given the size we got, is that it can be hard to clean. It’s machine washable but if it’s too big, it might be hard to fit in the washer. It also can trap dust, crumbs, and pet hair if you don’t clean frequently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, blue color and extremely soft
reviews.reviewText: I got this as a throw rug for a spare room, and the blue color is quite brilliant. It has a nice long hair and easy to move around. I would probably like a thicker pad on it myself, but I would give it a five star for the price and the look and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft. Nice padding for a child.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great rug for a kids room. The color is accurate. It’s incredibly soft. My son absolutely loves it. We have only had it a month, but so far it’s held up well. It has a little padding that is good for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Exactly What’s Pictured
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this rug based on two main factors: machine washable and the plushness of it. Upon receiving it and setting it up, it wasn’t quite as thick and plush as I imagined based off the posted photos. While it is soft, I also find it to be thinner with a cheaper material feel. I have three dogs and a high traffic living room. I wanted something that would be cost efficient, easily to be clean, and plusher for my son to sit on. It’s not the best to vacuum, unfortunately. I did toss it in the washer just yesterday after a spill. The catch is they say not to dry it with the dryer and let it air dry, leaving your area without a rug for a longer period of time. Something I was not expecting. Taking it out of the washer, you can truly see how thin the product is and gaps where there’s no fibers. This rug could potentially be nice for a less traffic area with no pet hair (holds onto it for dear life) and where it’s less likely to obtain the need to be washed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't think this rug would be as plush as the pics show with the hand nearly buried in it....its exactly as shown/stated! This rug is super soft, plush and shaggy! I wanted something soft and sort of thick for my baby to play on instead of the hard wood floors. This rug went way beyond my expectations!! It feels so nice and is thick and my baby and I love it! I also love that you don't need an anti slip mat under it, it already has anti slip dots on the underside! It seems to be made well and I'm very happy with the quality for the price! I would certainly recommend this to anyone looking for a super soft, shaggier rug...you will not be disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great rug, but slippery
reviews.reviewText: Thus rug was better quality than I expected. It is very plush and the shag is very long and silky making it comfortable for bare feet and to lay on. My dogs also love it more than their beds! My only complaint is it is slippery. It doesn't slide on the floor (mine is place overtop of carpet), the rug itself is so smooth and silky you easy slide a little while walking on it. If you have balance problems this is not the rug for you.
